87147.<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I would like you to fetch me Peace Incense,
it's said to be dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s
in the Lyana Desolate Area.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57479.<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia, I'm with a visitor now. Can you not
even properly knock?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57480.<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I heard from Mama... You're holding a
meeting for everyone in town, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87175.<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I-instead of that, how about you go to my
sister's grave... And offer even a single
flower?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57481.<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You... You always make excuses that you're
too busy to... You never once visited her
grave, have you.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57482.<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I, as mayor, have things I must do.
A child should never interrupt every
single one of an adult's actions.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57484.<voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>You are interrupting our conversation.
Now, leave.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57485.<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Really, although it's unbecoming, I have
to put my foot down. Recently, she has
become quite brazen...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57486.<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Now then, there isn't much time before the
meeting. Please get the Peace Incense I
requested.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57487.<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The town's adults are scared stupid because
they think the dead children despise them...
Here, have a look at my sister's diary.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57489.……今まで 大人に反抗してきた 私たちだけど\n自力で 生活するようになってから:
..."Up until now, we've always rebelled against the
adults, however, now that we're living on our own,
we've come to understand the adults' merits."

57490.今は みんなで 毎日 ダーマ神殿に行って\n大人たちが 早く帰ってくるように\n:
"Now everyone, everyday, goes to Alltrades Abbey and
we see to it that we don't miss a prayer, in order
for the adults to soon return."

57491.もしかしたら 大人たちとは\nもう 二度と会えないのかもしれないけど\n祈りつづ:
"There's a chance we might never see the adults ever
again, but if we keep praying, then someday..."

57492.<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...My older sister and the others don't hate them. Every
day, at Alltrades Abbey they quietly pray, and await
the adults' return.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57493.<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Whereas the adults all have stopped going to pray...
It's completely backwards.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57494.<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Oh, you've brought the incense just in time
for the meeting. Can you please give it to
me at once?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57495.<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Oh yeah, why is that. Without the Peace Incense, the
meeting cannot start. Come now, may you give it to me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57496.<pc>は ブラト町長に\n安らぎの香を 渡した。: <pc> gave Mayor Burat the Peace Incense.

57497.<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Yeah, we are saved. This time, a special guest is here
as well, so the meeting will surely go about smoothly.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57498.<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Since I am told the discussion will certainly be
beneficial, you, too, are welcome to join us.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57499.町中の 大人たちが\n集会所に 集まってきた。:
From all over town, adults came to gather at the
Assembly Hall.

57500.<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Everyone, having gathered for such a sudden
meeting today, truly, I thank you very much.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57501.<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Since the old church's accident, the town
has been in profound grief. And beginning
to fear the ghostly figures. Therefore...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57502.<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Today, I will free you from your grief and worries;
that is why I have come.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57503.<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I am Sadak. Rescuing this town from evil spirits
threatening it is what I do as a traveling medium.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57504.<voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>Ou-our children are... Evil spirits, you say!?<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57505.<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Correct, they are assuredly evil spirits.
When one dies bearing a grudge, their soul
becomes an evil spirit who curse the living!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57506.<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>First, to prevent evil spirits from entering, I have
prepared Peace Incense mixed with Saint's Ashes; let's
burn it to purify the Assembly Hall.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57507.<voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>Ah? Smells nice...<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57508.<voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>Yeah... It's a bit comforting...<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57509.<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Now, please think back to a time like
when your children were alive.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57510.<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>There is a reason for the children to hold
something like a grudge, is there not?
<auto_br=5000>
You remember mistreating the children,
do you not?<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57511.<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>I-I... Always had a strict curfew and didn't let them
play much...<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57512.<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>I-I... Always lectured them about studying and that
pushed them over the edge...<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57513.<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I see... Strict discipline pushed the town's children to
hate the adults and begin to seclude themselves in
the old church to play.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57514.<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Thus, due to the landslide, they lost their lives, and
wander this world as grudge-bearing evil spirits...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57515.<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>As it is, the evil spirits will continue to curse
everyone, until you have joined them...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57516.<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>However, please do not worry. Everyone shall have no
reason to be afraid of the evil spirits from here on,
as I shall protect you!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57517.<voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...You're a liar, aren't you.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57518.<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>My sister and the others don't have some stupid grudge
against the adults. If you examine this diary, you
should understand...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57519.<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...This is my sister's diary. It's a special diary that
connects this world with the other world.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57520.<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...If you read inside, you'll understand about that
world. The children who died in the church accident
don't even realize that they are dead.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57521.<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>In the world of the dead where there are only children,
they keep waiting for the adults whom somehow vanished
to return!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57522.<voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia! Again, you dare to defy me!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57523.<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Even so far as to imitate Liselotte's handwriting for
this horrid, elaborate hoax. With this child's
daydream, you are manipulating the adults, aren't you!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57524.<voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>It... It's not some daydream...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57525.<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Right now, leave! Never again get in my way!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57526.<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Honestly, I apologize for my daughter's unbelievable
rudeness... She completely rained on this important
meeting.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57527.<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>No, no, don't worry about it. For today, let's adjourn
and we'll continue this meeting again another day.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57528.<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Having achieved our goal for today, we can be excused.
As for the evil spirits, please leave them to me.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57529.大人たちは サダクの後に\nしたがうように 出ていった……。: The adults followed Sadak and left...

57530.<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Truly, thank you for your help in preparation

57531.<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>As Sadak said, thanks to the Peace Incense,

57532.<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I hope this won't deter you from joining

57533.<voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Now then, if you'll excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000069.<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm worried about Lucolia. She doesn't lie like that!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000070.<voice 04338_29000070><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04338_29000070><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You're right, huh. We gotta tell her—even if it's
